subject: Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Oxbow appears primed for the challenge of the Belmont Stakes, the longest of the Triple Crown races, but the status of the Kentucky Derby champion Orb is less certain.
snippet: Oxbow appears primed for the challenge of the Belmont Stakes, the longest of the Triple Crown races, but the status of the Kentucky Derby champion Orb is less certain.
